description: Full voice conversation loop - speak aloud, listen for user response, and respond verbally. Requires both TTS (say) and STT (listen) tools.

phases.name: speak_greeting
phases.instructions:
Use the 'say' tool to speak a friendly greeting to the user. Ask them a simple question like 'How can I help you today?'

Keep the text natural and conversational. You can use ElevenLabs audio tags like [friendly] or [curious] for expressiveness.

phases.name: listen_response
phases.instructions: Use the 'listen' tool to hear the user's response. Set a welcoming prompt message.

phases.name: speak_reply
phases.instructions:
Respond to what the user said using the 'say' tool.

User's response:
{{ outputs.listen_response }}

Generate a natural, helpful spoken response. If there was an error with voice input, speak a message asking them to try again.
